com.lpoo.game.view.screens

Class MenuScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
      • com.lpoo.game.view.screens.MenuScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CustomizeMenuScreen, LevelMenuScreen, MainMenuScreen

    public abstract class MenuScreen
extends com.badlogic.gdx.ScreenAdapter
    Abstract Class used to represent all Views that are Menus.
